p1.name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro
p1.content: The Apple iPhone 15 Pro features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, the powerful A17 Pro chip, titanium frame, and a triple-lens camera system with 48MP main sensor. It supports fast charging, 5G, and MagSafe accessories for seamless connectivity.

p2.name: Noise Cancelling Headphones
p2.content: These over-ear noise-cancelling headphones provide high-fidelity sound and adaptive noise control, ideal for travel and focus. Equipped with Bluetooth 5.3, 30-hour battery life, and quick charge support. Perfect for work-from-home and studio sessions.

p3.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 6
p3.content: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 comes with advanced sleep tracking, ECG monitoring, and personalized fitness tracking. Featuring a circular AMOLED display, 5ATM water resistance, and integration with Samsung Health. A perfect all-day smartwatch for Android users.

p4.name: Dell XPS 15 Laptop
p4.content: Dell XPS 15 delivers power with a 13th Gen Intel i7 processor, NVIDIA RTX 4070 GPU, and 16GB DDR5 RAM. Features a stunning 15.6-inch 3.5K OLED display, premium aluminum chassis, and long battery life â€” suitable for creators and professionals.

p5.name: Apple MacBook Air M3
p5.content: Apple MacBook Air M3 features the Apple M3 chip, a fanless lightweight design, 18-hour battery life, and a 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display. Perfect for productivity, programming, and multimedia with excellent thermal efficiency and silent performance.

p6.name: Sony WH-1000XM5
p6.content: Sony WH-1000XM5 headphones offer industry-leading noise cancellation, multi-device connectivity, and crystal-clear calls with AI noise reduction. Up to 40 hours of playtime and comfortable lightweight design make them perfect for travelers.

p7.name: Google Pixel 8 Pro
p7.content: Google Pixel 8 Pro brings AI-powered photography with the Tensor G3 processor, 50MP main camera, and 120Hz LTPO OLED display. Offers 7 years of software updates, Titan M2 security chip, and superior night photography.

p8.name: Apple Watch Series 9
p8.content: Apple Watch Series 9 includes a faster S9 chip, double-tap gesture control, temperature sensor, ECG app, and advanced sleep tracking. Integrated with Siri on-device and supports crash detection and emergency SOS.

p9.name: Fitbit Charge 6
p9.content: Fitbit Charge 6 combines health and fitness tracking with heart rate monitoring, stress management, and Google Fit integration. Includes GPS tracking, sleep stages analysis, and battery life up to 7 days.

p10.name: ASUS ROG Strix G16
p10.content: ASUS ROG Strix G16 gaming laptop packs an Intel Core i9-13980HX, NVIDIA RTX 4080 GPU, and a 240Hz QHD+ display. Designed for gamers and creators with intelligent cooling and customizable RGB keyboard.

p11.name: Apple AirPods Pro 2
p11.content: Apple AirPods Pro 2 deliver adaptive transparency, spatial audio, and active noise cancellation powered by the H2 chip. Support MagSafe charging, IPX4 water resistance, and seamless integration across Apple devices.

p12.name: Samsung Galaxy Buds 2 Pro
p12.content: Samsung Galaxy Buds 2 Pro offer 24-bit Hi-Fi audio, intelligent active noise cancellation, and voice detect features. Ergonomic design ensures comfort, and Auto Switch allows seamless device connectivity.

p13.name: HP Spectre x360 14
p13.content: HP Spectre x360 14 is a 2-in-1 convertible laptop with a 13.5-inch OLED touch display, 12th Gen Intel i7 CPU, and long battery life. Built for versatility, combining portability with premium performance and pen support.

p14.name: OnePlus Watch 2
p14.content: OnePlus Watch 2 offers dual-engine architecture for long battery life, fitness tracking, and Google WearOS integration. Features AMOLED display, 5ATM water resistance, and fast charging support.

p15.name: JBL Charge 5 Bluetooth Speaker
p15.content: JBL Charge 5 is a portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful bass, 20 hours of playtime, IP67 waterproof and dustproof rating. Doubles as a power bank for charging devices via USB-C.

p16.name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon
p16.content: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 11 features Intel Evo i7 processor, carbon fiber build, and a 2.8K display. Known for durability, long battery life, and enterprise-grade security.

p17.name: Amazon Echo Dot 5th Gen
p17.content: Amazon Echo Dot 5th Gen smart speaker provides Alexa voice control, better bass, temperature sensor, and motion detection. Ideal for home automation and hands-free control.

p18.name: Google Nest Hub 2nd Gen
p18.content: Google Nest Hub 2nd Gen features a 7-inch smart display, Google Assistant, gesture control, and sleep sensing. Integrates with smart devices for voice-controlled automation.

p19.name: Sony PlayStation 5
p19.content: Sony PlayStation 5 delivers next-gen performance with AMD Ryzen Zen 2 CPU, RDNA 2 GPU, and 4K gaming support. Features DualSense haptic feedback and lightning-fast SSD.

p20.name: Xbox Series X
p20.content: Microsoft Xbox Series X offers 12 teraflops of power, fast loading times, 4K HDR gaming, and backward compatibility with thousands of titles. Features quick resume and Dolby Atmos support.
